Method used to create a new model that inherits from the base Falcon Model.

protoProps
Properties for the prototype of a class
staticProps
Static properties for a given object
var Dog = Falcon.Model.extend({ url: "dog.json" }); var dog = new Dog(); console.log( dog instanceof Falcon.Object ); // => true console.log( dog instanceof Falcon.Model ); // => true console.log( dog instanceof Dog ); // => true
